content: the natural beauty socks were first designed in 2020 to accompany the launch of a new yarn the romney pure sock a nylon-free yarn using 100% romney wool this beautifully strong and woolly wool is sourced from an eco-farm in south-east england and worsted spun just minutes from the flock then in 2023 the pattern was graded to add two extra sizes the pattern is knitted with circular needles using the magic loop method dpns can be substituted the socks begin at the toe and worked in the round giving you a seamless look from start to finish delicate cables on either side of the lace pattern are separated with purl stitches to frame the lace panel through the centre instructions are given for a gusset and heel flap the heel flap uses a simple knit 1 slip 1 stitch pattern for extra durability another set of cables is introduced at the beginning of the leg to add further interest to the sides of your sock in your final round the last stitch is purled and marks the beginning of the cuff round in order for 2 knit stitches to align centre with the lace pattern in the front a 2x2 rib with a twisted knit stitch is used in the cuff though any style of cuff can be used but be mindful of where your stitches fall in relation to the pattern when you sign up you ll receive the free natural beauty sock pattern and find out more about annabel williams sustainable traceable luxurious wools plus the latest shop updates news discounts and freebies sizes 1 2 3 designed to fit with approx 1 25 cm/0 5 negative ease foot and leg length are adjustable finished measurements leg and foot circumference 19 5 21 5 23 cm/7 75 8 5 9 recommended leg length 17 17 17 cm/6 75 6 75 6 75 from the cuff to the start of the heel needles size 2 5 mm us 1-2 circular needles 80 cm/32 long or needle size to obtain gauge cable needle or dpn of the same size notions sewing needle stitch marker cable needle gauge 28 sts x 44 rounds = 10 cm/4 in stockinette yarn annabel williams romney pure sock 4-ply/fingering weight 100% wool 330 m/360 yds per 100g/3 5oz skein 1 1 1 skein this pattern is available for free on sign up future patterns are shared with subscribers as they are released if you d like access to additional patterns from my collection they are available via a contribution through ko-fi https //ko-fi com/annabelwilliamsyarn 1 1 https //ko-fi com/annabelwilliamsyarn
